price: (Nkͻmhyεni), hwε mfatoho a wͻde susu woͻ, enti wͻn ayera, na wͻntumi nhunu kwan.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa ḍarabū laka al-amthāla faḍallū falā yastaṭīʿūna sabīlan
